## Publications

```{r setup, echo  = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results="asis"}
library(bibtex)
library(RefManageR)
pubs <- ReadBib("publications.bib")
RefManageR::NoCite(pubs)
PrintBibliography(pubs, .opts = list(style = "html",
                                     bib.style = "authoryear"))
```
